title: Pinnacles National Park: Donate
body: Donate          If you'd like to contribute to the Pinnacles Partnership, they are accepting donations. Your financial support at any level is deeply appreciated and is tax deductible through the Pinnacles Partnership (Tax ID: 76-0849623). To join online, please visit their donation page. You can also join by mail. Please make your check payable to: Pinnacles Partnership. Mail to: P.O. Box 2080 Hollister, CA 95024-2080 831-389-4486 x239 web page: www.pinnaclespartnership.org email: info@pinnaclespartnership.org   We appreciate your support.
